title: BIKEID-CHARLI3-SUPERIOR BikeID and Supply Chain data
summary: Bikes lack a VIN-like universal ID and face Supply chain regulations (DPP). No lifecycle records leads to: poor service, theft, and lack of regulatory compliance. Blockchain adoption solves this.
solution: Unique BikeIDs on chain provide universal identity frameworks for product lifecycle and supply chain data compliance, secured with Oracle network transparency and decentralization.
proposer_relevant_experience:
the whole team will consist of **11 professionals**. 6 developers, 1 CTO,  2 Business development operators,  1 Project manager and 1 representative from Superior bikes for consultancy.

3 Developers will be from the Charli3 side to ensure partnerchain datum management and implementation.

2 Developers are employed from BIKEID for imlementation of front end and API items such as KPI dashboards, private API of manufacturing and BIN data, as well as proper implementation with Iagon.

CTO to manage scrums and guide the team through the technical roadmap

1 BD from each team will act to secure and maintain partnerships with retailers, regulators, institutions, and Cardano. 

Not all team members are set to work on every milestone

sub_fields.title: Describe your established collaborations.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale for your established collaborations.
sub_fields.answer:
**BIKE ID Collaborations**

**Superior Bikes \(co\-proposer\) \-**

- provide testing enviroment in factory, distribution network

- provide test bicycles

- PIM, MES integration 

- industry oversight 

**Romet** - Poland’s largest manufacturer (500k+/y). Factory PIM integrated, bikes registered in real time. Customers activate Proof of Ownership

**Ecobike** - E-bike manufacturer. Bikes tagged at production. Traceability, financing, data visibility, proof of origin, theft protection

**Centrum Rowerowe** - Sells 70k bikes today, 300k+ by 2030. Bikes tagged at warehouse, automation from logistics to showroom

**MediaExpert **- Retailer, every bike gets BikeID, bundling service plans, insurance, financing

**Loca Bikes** - High-end custom bikes with artist collabs. BikeID authenticity and NFT

**CHARLI3 Collaborations**

Charli3 has established relationships with the major labs: **Anastasia Labs, Mlabs, and Txpipe**. Additionally, we work closely with the S**teelswap\.io and Moneta** teams to develop innovations such as the Cardano Token Data API, Charli3 Dendrite, and USDM's Proof of Reserve. We have an established MOU with **Fida\.finance** and the **Howden Group**, ongoing discussions with RWA specialists such as **Zengate** and their World Food F14 proposal.

That said, this proposal is to bring a Digital Product Passport (DPP) and product lifecycle solution to the Charli3 Partner-chain and Cardano for BIKEID.

sub_fields.title: Describe funding commitments.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale for your funding commitments.
sub_fields.answer:
**Current commitments:** SUPERIOR, Romet and Ecobike have commited resources for factory integration of BIN into production systems as well as commited to pre-ordering batches of BikeID kits. Centrum Rowerowe invests in NFC tagging infrastructure, software integrations and retail rollout. MediaExpert allocates budget for BIN-based customer retention and digital engagement.

These commitments make up the current BIKEID infrastructure. This project is to create a data funnel for on chain immutable BIKEID data storage that can be used as a base for other industries into the future to manage supply chain regulations such as DPP.

sub_fields.title: Describe your key performance metrics.
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale for your key performance metrics.
sub_fields.answer:
**BIKE ID metrics**

⁠-% of bikes recorded in BIN Cloud at production (target: 100%)

-Customer BikeID activation rate (% activating Proof of Ownership vs Pre-registered bike or BikeID Kit purchase)

-% of customers engaging post-sale (service and retail retention)

-Number of bikes sold with extended warranty, service plans and insurance

-Recurring revenue per customer (service, financing)

-Theft recovery rates for BikeID-registered bikes

-Root hash txns of BINs on Cardano

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
BikeID Universal Digital Identity for the Global Cycling Industry

**The Problem \- A Fragmented Industry**

The global cycling market, worth over €60 billion annually, has a critical gap: no universal identity system. Unlike cars, which are tracked by a VIN from factory to scrapyard, bicycles become “invisible” once they leave production.

This fragmentation creates inefficiencies and lost opportunities for every stakeholder:

The result is millions of stolen bikes with recovery rates below 10%, fragmented revenue streams, and depressed second-hand values due to unverifiable authenticity and history.

The BikeID Solution and The Bicycle Identification Number (BIN)

BikeID creates a secure, permanent, universal digital identity for every bicycle using high grade imbedded NFC tags.

Our key innovation enabling the scaling and rollout of the system are our proprietary, ultra-thin BikeID tags combined Bicycle Identification Number creating a digital identity for each bicycle.

**Each bike receives:**

- globally unique, 24-character Bicycle Identification Number (BIN)
- tamper-proof RFID/NFC tag secured on the bicycle frame
- globally supported Proof of Ownership NFC card
- BIN Cloud with bike lifecycle event, ownership and history record securely stored with Proof of Bike

**Benefits and Opportunities for Stakeholders**

1. **Riders**

At its core, BikeID benefits the rider: global Proof of Ownership, stronger theft protection, higher resale value, and access to services like insurance, financing, and maintenance reminders. Activation is simple via BikeID NFC tag or BikeID card. Transfer of ownership is super easy and reporting bicycle theft with a single click informs the local police.

Standalone BikeID Kits containing BikeID tag and card, are now available in cycling stores and Allegro. This is a strong value proposition for cyclists to secure their bicycle but also a big opportunity for brands and retailers to tap into additional revenue sources and give customer retention a real boost.

1. **Manufacturers**

BikeID integrates with factory ERP and PIM systems, delivering real-time traceability and full visibility across the value chain. It streamlines stock financing, prevents warranty fraud, and opens new revenue streams through direct customer engagement.

Example - Romet: Poland’s largest manufacturer (500k+ bikes/year) is integrating BikeID and BIN registration at the factory to register every bike in real time.

1. **Brands**

BikeID bridges the gap between brands and riders. It enables authenticity for high-end builds, direct recalls, and lifecycle services like extended warranties, captive finance and service plans.

Example - Loca Bikes: Premium custom bikes with a permanent digital passport, supporting luxury collaborations, digital certificates and NFTs.

1. **Retailers**

BikeID automates operations from warehouse check-in to sales and allows retailers to offer bundled, additional high margin services. Every transaction becomes digitally connected, allowing retailers to drive retention with service reminders, upsells, and ongoing engagement. Based on our calculations, a universal BikeID can add on average €200 to every bike over the bicycle lifecycle.

_Example - Centrum Rowerowe: Launching BIN in 2026 to turn high-volume sales into lasting relationships _

**Technical On\-Chain Solution**

Technical Approach

Our hybrid implementation model provides a scalable, efficient and financially viable solution

**Charli3's Cardano Partnerchain** offers the perfect mix of economic viability and Merkle Tree framework for large data sets. All Trees anchor cryptographic proofs in unique leafs on the Partnerchain that can be pushed to Cardano main-net if needed. On-chain proofs enable ownership, non-membership (critical for logistics), and deletion (eg. recycling)

- Proof of Bike and Ownership,
- Detailed bike and lifecycle data is stored off-chain in secure databases
- Events & ownership data (Iagon decentralized storage)

Public bicycle data (eg. specifications, theft reports)

BIN registration is free; paid “events” (ownership transfers, service updates) cost €0.25 each

1. **Proof of Bike; Proof of Ownership \(on\-chain\)**

At the core of BIN is Proof of Bike, a cryptographic certificate that links a physical bicycle to its unique digital identity. This record, anchored directly to Charli3's Cardano Partnerchain, which cannot be altered or forged serves as immutable Proof of Ownership, giving riders confidence their bike is verifiable anywhere in the world.

For manufacturers, insurers, and police, this on-chain proof provides a trusted foundation to combat theft, fraud, and counterfeit claims at a manageable and stable price.



**2\. Middleware solution** for data integration on chain and long term privatized storage of Proof of Bike.

This layer will read from the PostgreSQL database with all data categories for storage. BIKEID gathers this data from manufactureres and users. This middleware solution will produce an API allowing data to flow outwards to the blockchain and privatized storage. 



**3\. Events & Ownership Data \(iagon decentralized storage\)**

Beyond ownership, a bicycle generates a series of events throughout its lifecycle

-sales

-transfers

-service records, and upgrades.

These are dynamic data points, valuable for retailers, brands, and riders, that don’t require the cost or permanence of being fully on-chain. Each event is linked back to the bike’s BIN, creating a transparent and auditable history while keeping costs low and performance high.

BIN uses Iagon decentralized cloud storage to handle dynamic ownership and event data because it combines security, resilience, and compliance at enterprise scale. Unlike centralized servers, Iagon distributes encrypted data fragments across a decentralized network, eliminating single points of failure and ensuring survivability even if parts of the network go offline. This architecture guarantees high availability, tamper-resistance, and GDPR-compliant data handling, making it ideal for sensitive yet evolving records like transfers, service logs, and warranty updates. For BIN, Iagon provides the balance of trust, performance, and cost-efficiency needed to support millions of bikes worldwide.

**4\. Public Bicycle Data \(BIN Cloud\) with Charli3 Partnerchain**

Certain data needs to be fast, dynamic, accessible, and widely available on a public ledger:

- model specifications,
- production details,
- warranty status,
- and other non-sensitive attributes.

BikeID manages this through a PostgreSQL database, powering public queries from retailers, marketplaces, or even police databases. Each Merkle Tree leaf on Charli3 is a unique BikeID, holding all publically required data, and keeping Iagon private data seperate.

This ensures instant access to validated information without exposing sensitive ownership records. By separating public data from personal data, BIN achieves both speed and compliance, balancing blockchain transparency for the industry with privacy for the rider.

This design keeps costs minimal, ensures GDPR compliance, and supports millions of bikes. For premium builds, a full NFT-based “super BikeID” remains an option.

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
BikeID becomes a global, real-world application showcasing blockchain’s power at scale.

**\*\*One bike\. One record\. Everywhere\. Powered by Cardano Tech\. \*\***

BikeID creates one of the first large-scale, real-world applications of blockchain product identity

By anchoring millions of bicycles through Blockchain technology, we bring visibility, adoption, and credibility to the Cardano network. Every Proof of Bike record is a live demonstration of Cardano tech immutability, scalability, and sustainability. For the community, this proves Cardano is not only for finance but also for solving tangible, global problems.

**Cardano SPOs will be the main beneficiary of this operation\.** Their involvement with Charli3's partnerchain infrastructure will manage all off-chain data reads from BikeID's platform and validate them on-chain, with a further _root hash on Cardano main net, creating transaction attestations and transaction volume on Cardano_. Additionally, partnering with large global bicycle manufacturers has a multiplier effect. Each integration instantly brings hundreds of thousands of new BikeIDs on chain every year, creating one of the largest real-world identity use cases on any blockchain. Manufacturers act as on-ramps, embedding BikeID directly into production, which accelerates adoption at scale without requiring riders to be crypto-native. This not only drives millions of on-chain Proof of Ownership records but also positions Cardano as the backbone of a trusted global standard, visible in showrooms and factories worldwide.

BikeID has gained a lot of interest from financial institutions, mainly from banks and insurance companies who are looking to roll out similar level of services in cycling as they are currently provided to the automotive, but without a globally unique asset ID are unable to provide. This can easily form a snowball effect of digital financial services centred around Cardano-based cycling ecosystem.

We are working very closely with industry bodies such as CONEBI and CIE. These institutions represent hundreds of brands, distributors, and retailers across Europe and globally. By aligning Bicycle Identification Number with their policy and standardization efforts, we move from single-company adoption to industry-wide adoption. This institutional backing helps establish BIN as the de facto identity standard for bicycles, similar to how VIN is mandated in the automotive sector. **For Cardano, it means blockchain becomes embedded at the regulatory and policy level**, ensuring long-term adoption, credibility, and integration into insurance, mobility, and sustainability frameworks.

**To measure the impact we will track both adoption and engagement metrics to demonstrate the Cardano Partnerchain utility at scale**

- Number of bikes registered on-chain (factory-level integrations and retail activations)
- Number of Proof of Ownership verifications executed on-chain
- Percentage of theft recovery cases linked to BIN records
- Growth in partner integrations (manufacturers, retailers, insurers)

**Results will be openly shared with the Cardano community through**

- Regular progress reports and dashboards showing live adoption metrics
- Open APIs and documentation for developers to build new services (insurance, marketplaces, financing) on top of BIN
- Case studies with manufacturers, retailers, and riders to highlight Cardano’s role
- Presentations at Cardano events, demonstrating how blockchain-backed identity is solving theft, fraud, and data fragmentation

BikeID will showcase Cardano created tech as the backbone of a trusted global product identity system, delivering adoption, data, and real-world impact the community can measure and build upon.

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
**Together, Charli3 and BIKEID combine proven Cardano\-native infrastructure with deep real\-world industry expertise to deliver a credible, execution\-ready proposal, with support from Superior bikes, a leader in bicycle manufacturing\.**

Charli3 is one of the oldest and most trusted projects in the Cardano ecosystem, active since 2021 and continuously shipping. The team has delivered 11/11 Catalyst-funded projects with evidence-based reporting, passed multiple third-party audits (CertiK, Anastasia Labs), and launched Cardano’s first decentralized oracle network in October 2022, which has operated with 100% ecosystem uptime. Beyond mainnet oracles, Charli3 has already implemented a functioning partnerchain oracle MVP in Substrate posting data directly to Cardano, demonstrating full-stack capability across Haskell/Plutus, Rust/Substrate, cross-chain integrations (EVM, Polkadot, upcoming Cardano chains like Midnight), and on-chain governance and incentives. The next step is to evolve this from a team-operated MVP into a community-governed, open-source oracle marketplace that any Cardano project can use, extend, and scale.



BIKEID complements this with 25+ years of hands-on experience in the automotive and mobility sectors, including building dealer management systems, mobility platforms, and AI solutions for global brands such as Hyundai, Mercedes Benz, and Volkswagen. The team is deeply familiar with complex manufacturing, retail, and aftersales processes, and has already validated the technical design with manufacturers and retailers, with pilots being prepared for Romet, Ecobike, and Centrum Rowerowe. BIN’s developers bring strong Cardano and enterprise integration expertise (smart contracts, identity, IPFS, Hydra, ERP/MES, PIM, DMS) and are backed by established governance processes, clear KPIs, and transparent fund management.

BIKEID also is the 2025 Cardano Summit Battle of the Builders Champion - showcasing their understanding of business and blockchain implementation. 



In combination, Charli3 provides robust, audited, production-ready oracle infrastructure and Cardano ecosystem credibility, while BIN ensures real-world adoption through industry partnerships, stepwise pilots, measurable KPIs, and open dashboards and APIs. Funding this collaboration now will close Cardano’s oracle and real-world data gap at a critical point in the growth of its DeFi and RWA ecosystem, while maintaining the high accountability and transparency standards expected by Catalyst.

Notable Charli3 Catalyst completed products

[https://milestones\.projectcatalyst\.io/projects/1100090](https://milestones.projectcatalyst.io/projects/1100090)

[https://milestones\.projectcatalyst\.io/projects/1100091](https://milestones.projectcatalyst.io/projects/1100091)

[https://milestones\.projectcatalyst\.io/projects/1100093](https://milestones.projectcatalyst.io/projects/1100093)

sub_fields.description: A clear, concise title for this milestone
sub_fields.answer: Technical Architecture, Middleware & Blockchain Anchoring

sub_fields.title: Milestone Outputs
sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer:
In this stage, we establish the core technical foundation of BIN on Charli3's Partnerchain.

The hybrid data model will be finalized: Proof of Bike anchored on-chain, event and ownership data stored in Iagon decentralized storage, and public bicycle data in BIN Cloud



A middleware solution is at the heart of this functionality of writing all Proof of Bike data on Charli3 partnerchain, Iagon, and further to Cardano.

An API must be created for readability of Proof of Bike data to create the BIN on-chain. 



This milestone ensures that every bicycle can be uniquely identified, with a tamper-proof record secured on the Partnerchain, while keeping the architecture scalable and GDPR-compliant



Deliverables include working prototypes of BIN issuance process, initial design documentation, and test functionality of API from BikeID database.

- design Documentation of the finalized data flow for : Charli3 Partnerchain <-- BikeID DB -->  Iagon storage
- Operational Middleware API Connected to Existing DB
- Deterministic Hashing of Bicycle Metadata
- Production-Ready Deployment & Documentation

sub_fields.title: Milestone Title
sub_fields.description: A clear, concise title for this milestone
sub_fields.answer: Development of Proof of Ownership, Ownership Transfers, and Theft Recovery

sub_fields.title: Milestone Outputs
sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer:
This milestone focuses on the most valuable rider-facing functionality: verifiable Proof of Ownership, secure ownership transfers, and integrated theft reporting and recovery.

Building on the architecture from Milestone 2, we will extend the model to support real-world use cases:

Proof of Ownership – riders activate their BIN by scanning a BikeID tag, proving themselves as the rightful owner on-chain. Partnerchain and Cardano main net

Ownership Transfers – resale, trade-in, or insurance-related transfers are securely recorded, with each transaction maintaining a transparent chain of custody

Theft Reporting & Recovery Events – riders can mark a bike as stolen via their BikeID record, instantly updating its blockchain status. Police or insurers can query the BIN to verify theft status, improving deterrence and recovery rates

This milestone ensures BIN delivers both value and trust: riders protect their bikes, retailers and insurers gain verified processes, and institutions have a trusted source of truth for recovery.

sub_fields.title: Acceptance Criteria
sub_fields.description: Specific conditions that must be met
sub_fields.answer:
- Proof of Ownership and ownership transfers deployed on Charli3 Cardano Partnerchain 
- Transfers between at least two parties tested and verifiable on-chain
- Theft flagging process implemented: rider can report bike stolen, and query returns theft status
- Ownership history and theft status clearly visible on blockchain explorer

sub_fields.title: Evidence of Completion
sub_fields.description: How you will demonstrate achievement
sub_fields.answer:
- GitHub repository updated with Proof of Ownership, transfer, and theft reporting design. 

- Testnet explorer links showing:

• 10 successful ownership activations

• 5 successful ownership transfers

• 5 theft reports + status verification queries

- Demo video: activation of ownership, transfer of ownership, and theft flagging + status check.

- Pilot partner (e.g., retailer or insurer) feedback confirming process usability and accuracy

- Blockchain explorer live
- Root hash visible on Cardano Main net

sub_fields.title: Milestone Outputs
sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer:
This milestone delivers BikeID into the retail environment, where customer activation, onboarding, and, lifecycle events take place. Working with retail partners (e.g. Centrum Rowerowe, MediaExpert), we will implement:

- BikeID tagging at warehouse entry
- and Enable activation flows at point of sale



Similarly, Integrating with Ready Bike and Bike Folder for faster delivery, events such as maintenance visits, repairs, upgrades, insurance claims, and warranties will be recorded against the BIN



Customers purchasing a BikeID KIT will link their BIN either through NFC scan or digital card, automatically activating Proof of Ownership. Retailers will benefit from automated logistics (stock tagged upon arrival), simplified warranty handling, and direct customer engagement channels.

By the end of this milestone, BikeID will be functioning in real-world retail scenarios, with customers actively registering their bikes on the network. Riders, retailers and service providers will have access to real-time records.

sub_fields.title: Acceptance Criteria
sub_fields.description: Specific conditions that must be met
sub_fields.answer:
- BikeID tags applied to bikes in at least one retail warehouse and tracked to showroom
- Customer onboarding process fully functional: 50 customer activation of Proof of Ownership via BikeID KIT during in store pilot
- Retailer dashboard live: view stock status, sales activations, and ownership history
- 50 lifecycle events processes recorded in Iagon and linked to BIN on chain.
- validation by at least 1 lifecycle event partner (ex: service provider, insurer, etc...)

sub_fields.title: Evidence of Completion
sub_fields.description: How you will demonstrate achievement
sub_fields.answer:
- Retail system screenshots showing BIN registration flows and dashboards
- Explorer links showing customer activations recorded on-chain
- Explorer links showing lifecycle activations recorded on-chain
- Screenshot of Lifecycle event and blockchain hash
- Demo video of a live retail purchase with activation

Partner feedback from at least one retail group

sub_fields.title: Milestone Title
sub_fields.description: A clear, concise title for this milestone
sub_fields.answer: Institutional Engagement and API Access

sub_fields.title: Milestone Outputs
sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer:
To establish BIN as an industry standard, this milestone focuses on engaging industry institutions like CONEBI and CIE, along with European Union institutions and law enforcement services.



We will develop and release public APIs allowing institutions to query BIN records (Proof of Bike, theft status, ownership verification) in real time.



This ensures interoperability and supports large-scale adoption beyond individual companies.



Industry bodies will be presented with the BIN framework as a candidate for a universal bicycle identity standard, supported by Cardano blockchain anchoring.



This milestone positions BIN as a regulatory-ready solution.

sub_fields.title: Acceptance Criteria
sub_fields.description: Specific conditions that must be met
sub_fields.answer:
- Public API released with documentation for querying ownership, theft status, and service records

- Pilot engagement with public and law enforcement institution

- Presentation delivered to CIE at an industry event with formal feedback collected

- External validation: insurer successfully verifies BIN theft record

sub_fields.title: Evidence of Completion
sub_fields.description: How you will demonstrate achievement
sub_fields.answer:
- API documentation published for developer and institutional use

- Screenshots of successful API queries (ownership, theft check)

- Meeting notes and feedback from CIE

- Letter or written statement from at least one insurer partner confirming pilot testing

sub_fields.title: Milestone Title
sub_fields.description: A clear, concise title for this milestone
sub_fields.answer: Final Report and Community Outputs

sub_fields.title: Milestone Outputs
sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer:
This milestone consolidates all achievements and shares results with both the Cardano and cycling communities.



Outputs will include:



adoption metrics (number of bikes registered, activations, theft reports, service events and aforementioned KPIs)

case studies with partners

open-source API for developers

A final report and close-out video will summarize technical learnings, adoption impact, and future roadmap.

sub_fields.title: Acceptance Criteria
sub_fields.description: Specific conditions that must be met
sub_fields.answer:
- Public adoption dashboard showing KPIs - published on bikeid.org website

- Final project report published with technical and business results

- Project close-out video summarizing milestones, outputs, and partner impact

- Community presentation delivered at Cardano event

sub_fields.title: Evidence of Completion
sub_fields.description: How you will demonstrate achievement
sub_fields.answer:
- Live dashboard link accessible to Cardano community

- Published final report with metrics, learnings, and roadmap

- Close-out video uploaded and shared with community

- Event presentation slides and recording made public

sub_fields.title: Who is participating in the project team and what are their roles?
sub_fields.description: Who is participating in the project team and what are their roles?
sub_fields.answer:
the whole team will consist of **11 professionals**. 6 developers, 1 CTO,  2 Business development operators,  1 Project manager and 1 representative from Superior bikes for consultancy.

3 Developers will be from the Charli3 side to ensure partnerchain datum management and implementation.

2 Developers are employed from BIKEID for imlementation of front end and API items such as KPI dashboards, private API of manufacturing and BIN data, as well as proper implementation with Iagon.

CTO to manage scrums and guide the team through the technical roadmap

1 BD from each team will act to secure and maintain partnerships with retailers, regulators, institutions, and Cardano. 

Not all team members are set to work on every milestone

sub_fields.title: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.description: Please provide a cost breakdown of the proposed work and resources
sub_fields.answer:
All cost estimates are set at ADA $0.040 at time of writing.

Our funding request covers the full development and implementation of BIN on Cardano, including technical delivery, partner pilots, and community reporting.

Costs are distributed across six milestones to ensure accountability and alignment with deliverables.

Milestone 1 – Hiring, Project Planning & colaboration management : 10.4% - ₳75000

Milestone 2 – Technical Architecture, Middleware & Blockchain Anchoring: 24.3% - ₳175000

Milestone 3 – Retail Process- Customer onboarding and Lifecycle records : 24% - ₳172000

Milestone 4 – Retail Process- Customer onboarding and Lifecycle records : 21.1% - ₳152000

Milestone 5 – Institutional Engagement and Public APIs: 10% - ₳72000

Milestone 6 – Final Report and Community Outputs: 10.2% - ₳73000



**Labour & Subcontracting** (73%) - ₳525,870

Core development team

Subcontracted specialists

**Overheads & Infrastructure** (9%) - ₳64,710

Hosting (Postgres, APIs, dashboards).

IT/software services (development tools, cloud services for pilots).

**Materials & Hardware** (4%) - ₳28,760

RFID and NFC tags for pilot integrations (manufacturers & retailers).

**Community Engagement** (9%) - ₳64,710

Publicity, presentations at Cardano events, engagement with manufacturers, retailers, insurers, and institutions

**Reporting & Governance** (4%) - ₳28,760

Project management, KPI dashboard, community reporting, Catalyst close-out deliverables





Labor costs are in line with typical developer and blockchain specialist rates in Europe and Canada (€60–90/hour). We are allocating the majority of the budget (73%) to development.

Infrastructure costs are lean and directly tied to delivering pilots at factory and retail scale

Materials (RFID and NFC tags) are minimal but essential to enable pilots with Romet, Ecobike, and retailers

Community engagement & reporting (≈15%) ensures accountability to the Catalyst community through open dashboards, APIs, case studies, and a close-out video

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer:
Compared to the automotive sector, where VIN-related systems cost billions to deploy, BIN delivers a similar identity layer for cycling at a fraction of the cost.

Each manufacturer or retailer integration brings tens (if not hundreds) of thousands of bikes under the eyes of Cardan, based infrastructure and name, multiplying ecosystem adoption with a single partnership.

Once implemented, BikeID creates recurring on-chain activity (ownership transfers, service events, theft reports), driving sustainable usage of Cardano partnerchain infrastructure long after Catalyst funding ends.

**In short, Catalyst funds secure Cardano position as the backbone of a global industry standard\. This is direct, verifiable impact, and a high\-value use of community resources**
